title: China’s military involved in over 180 ‘coercive and risky’ incidents against US since 2021: Pentagon
description: Declassified footage shows ‘reckless manoeuvres’ by PLA jets approaching lawfully operating US assets, says official overseeing Indo-Pacific security.

title: China’s march to military modernisation still has barriers to overcome: from US tech curbs to Beijing’s own distrust of private sector
description: The country has the second biggest military budget in the world after the US, but Washington is taking a range of measures to maintain its advantage.

title: Diplomatic impunity: Chinese envoy uses rough language to describe relations with US
description: Xu Xueyan, deputy chief of mission in Beijing’s embassy in Washington, strongly dismisses US belief that China does better in bilateral relationship.

title: US secures Marshall Islands military deal, keeps China at bay in strategically vital Pacific region
description: Renewed agreement grants Pentagon access to archipelago’s land, air and sea in exchange for economic aid totalling US$2.3 billion over 20 years.

title: China’s small businesses bear the brunt of economic slump
description: Erratic shifts in China’s economic growth and consumption are proving to be far more than numbers on a page as small-business owners attempt to keep up normal operations.

title: China slams ‘provocative’ Canadian military plane ‘intrusion’ after close call during UN surveillance mission
description: The foreign ministry says a CP-140 reconnaissance plane undermined national security during a flight over the East China Sea, lodges ‘stern representations’ with Canada.

title: China’s debt-ridden local governments face rising pressure to repay debt, and fallout from possible property-developer collapses could be crushing
description: The hits could keep coming for local government coffers across China as debt-repayment pressure mounts after years of hefty spending on low-return infrastructure projects.

title: Chinese online shopping giant JD.com launches four-hour delivery in Hong Kong in battle against Alibaba’s Cainiao
description: Cainiao and JD Logistics have both stated their ambitions to build robust global delivery networks, with Hong Kong acting as an important hub.

title: US should be ‘peacemaker’ between Beijing and Taipei, Ma Ying-jeou says
description: Dialogue would also help avoid more US-China confrontation, according to Taiwan’s former president.

title: China’s Belt and Road Initiative to get a hi-tech boost, with ‘wealth of opportunities’ promised for partners
description: Addressing hundreds of business representatives at a belt and road conference on Tuesday, Vice-Premier He Lifeng calls for greater investments in big data, AI, e-commerce and new energy.

title: Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi backs efforts to give Palestinians their ‘legitimate national rights’ in call with Egyptian counterpart
description: Cairo has long been one of the key mediators in the region and has promised to remain in close contact with China during the current crisis.

title: Apple CEO Tim Cook makes second China visit in 2023 amid tough iPhone 15 market and App Store controversy
description: Cook’s latest China trip comes at a time when Apple’s iPhone 15 series is facing stiff competition from Huawei’s new 5G handsets.

title: China’s wants Inner Mongolia to be exemplar region for energy and minerals, boost Russia and Mongolia transport links
description: First provincial-level high-quality development plan from China’s State Council for the Inner Mongolia autonomous region focuses on ecology, energy, strategic minerals and border security.

title: US-China ties: focus on national security ‘not healthy’, head of advisory body says
description: Stephen Orlins, who leads National Committee on US-China Relations, says a mechanism should be set up for presidents to regularly meet.

title: Chinese President Xi Jinping kicks off belt and road forum with diplomatic charm offensive
description: Xi seeks to position China as supportive partner in meetings with Kazakh and Ethiopian leaders in Beijing.

title: Chinese embassy in US warns students against joining protests over Israel-Hamas conflict
description: Students told to ‘avoid going to crowded public places’ where demonstrations are being held after a series of incidents at leading US universities.

title: Baidu says AI chatbot Ernie now matches OpenAI’s GPT-4, unveils new enterprise tools
description: CEO Robin Li showed off the capabilities of Ernie Bot 4 at the Baidu World 2023 conference in Beijing on Tuesday.

title: China property crisis: troubled Country Garden fights to avert default as US$15 million offshore debt deadline looms
description: The troubled Chinese developer is fighting to avert its first ever actual default on an offshore debt as the grace period for a US$15.4 million payment enters its final hours.

title: Russian leader Putin arrives in China for Belt and Road Forum
description: The event marks 10 years of China’s Belt and Road Initiative, which Putin earlier said ‘fully meets and coincides’ with Russia’s interests.

title: Chinese satellite company tests data transfer to ground station mounted on vehicle
description: CGST sends remote sensing images from Jilin-1 satellite in orbit to optical telescope at 10Gbps but WeChat post does not reveal telescope’s aperture or pointing accuracy, or what kind of vehicle was used.

title: China food security: advanced rice thriving where most vegetation dies – the salt deserts of Xinjiang
description: Beijing has been casting the spotlight on Xinjiang for its local-level achievements in bolstering the nation’s self-sufficiency drive, and salt-tolerant rice is said to be making salinated soil arable for other seasonal crops.
